text: Motion

Hehe...
Perfect weather for a picnic, isn't it?

I've made lots of sandwiches and cookies,
so eat as much as you like!

Thanks!
Then, as a return gift... Here you go! A pudding!

I've actually been curious about that since earlier.
Isn't it the limited-time cheese collaboration?

Yeah! It was super delicious when I tried
it the other day, so I brought it with me!

Wow, really?
I'm looking forward to it!
Alright then...!
Motion
Let's dig in...!
Motion

Mmm... That was delicious~
I'm so full now~

Oh...
Look, Tenka-chan, Chiyuki-san!

So many cute flowers blooming here~!
And over there... Oh! And there too!
Wow, that's true!

It's like... if we didn't look from up here on the blanket,
we might have missed them...

Somehow...
finding them... feels like a little victory...!
Yeah~â˜†

Since the stems are too short to pick, it's a bit disappointing
that I can't show them to Producer-san and everyone...
How about taking a photo and sending it to them?
That's a good idea...!
Chiyuki-san, you're brilliant~!

No, I also,
somehow wanted to make it a lasting memory.
Motion
